trans-unit.source: Represents a complex shape that may be composed of arcs, curves, ellipses, lines, and rectangles.
trans-unit.target: 表示可能由弧、 曲线、 椭圆、 直线和矩形组成的复杂形状。

trans-unit.source: Each PathGeometry object defines a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects.
trans-unit.target: 每个 PathGeometry 对象定义一个集合<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: Each of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects is composed of one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, which actually define their shape.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象组成一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>对象，如<xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>，它们实际上定义了其形状。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The filled area of the PathGeometry is defined by taking all of the contained <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects that have their <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.IsFilled%2A> property set to `true` and applying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule%2A> to determine the enclosed area.
trans-unit.target: 通过将所包含的所有定义 PathGeometry 填充的区域<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.IsFilled%2A>属性设置为`true`并将其应用<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule%2A>来确定的封闭的区域。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.IsFilled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>类

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> which describes the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>描述的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>使用指定的类<> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> which describes the contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>描述的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Shapes.Path"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*> which specifies the transform applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>它指定应用的转换。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> into a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects and adds it to the path.
trans-unit.target: 将转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>划分成一组<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>对象并将其添加到路径。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** If the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> is animated, the conversion from <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> may result in some loss of information.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**如果指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>进行动画处理，从转换<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>到<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>可能会导致某些丢失信息。

trans-unit.source: The geometry to add to the path.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到路径的几何图形。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，它指定此边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: **注意︰**此方法不考虑任何钢笔帐户。

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在动画的基值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>对象用于计算边界框。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此边界框<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects from this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中删除所有<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>从此对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> version of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>的指定版本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the specified geometry is animated, its current animated values are used when constructing the new <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> (although the animations themselves are not copied).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的几何图形进行动画处理，构造新时将使用其当前的动画的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>（尽管不复制动画本身）。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>

trans-unit.source: If the geometry is animated, the conversion may result in some loss of precision.
trans-unit.target: 如果动态的几何图形，转换可能导致损失一些精度。

trans-unit.source: The geometry from which to create a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 从中创建几何图形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> created from the current values of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>从指定的当前值创建<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects that describe the path's contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>描述路径内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *moveAndDrawCommands* One or more move and draw commands.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法``` ``` # # XAML 属性元素用法``` ``` # # XAML 值*moveAndDrawCommands*一个或多个移动和绘制命令。

trans-unit.source: See [Path Markup Syntax](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[路径标记语法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreFigures* <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure?displayProperty=fullName> One or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> objects.
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreFigures* <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure?displayProperty=fullName>一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> objects that describe the path's contents.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>描述路径内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: Each individual <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> describes a shape.
trans-unit.target: 每个单独<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>描述一种形状。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.Figures*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how the intersecting areas contained in this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定如何在此包含的相交区域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>相结合。

trans-unit.source: **EvenOdd** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses.
trans-unit.target: **EvenOdd**通过从该点绘制射向无穷远任意方向和计算中给定形状中与该射线相交的路径段的个数来确定在形状上的点的"内部性"。

trans-unit.source: If this number is odd, the point is inside; if even, the point is outside.
trans-unit.target: 如果此数字为奇数，该点在内部;如果偶数，该点在外部。

trans-unit.source: **NonZero** Determines the "insideness" of a point on the shape by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
trans-unit.target: **非零**绘制从该点向任意方向的无穷远的射线，然后检查段形状与射线相交的位置确定的形状上的点的"内部性"。

trans-unit.source: Starting with a count of zero, add one each time a Segment crosses the ray from left to right and subtract one each time a path segment crosses the ray from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 从开始计数为零，添加一个每个时间段从左到右和减去一个每个与该射线每当路径段与射线相交从右到左。

trans-unit.source: After counting the crossings, if the result is zero then the point is outside the path.
trans-unit.target: 后对交叉点进行计数，如果结果为零，那么说明该点则位于路径外。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it is inside.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它在内部。

trans-unit.source: ![Fill rule illustration](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "Fill rule illustration") FillRule Example ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![填充规则图](~/add/media/ref-mil-fillrule-stars.PNG "填充规则图")FillRule 示例 # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Indicates how the intersecting areas of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> are combined.
trans-unit.target: 指示如何相交区域这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>相结合。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `EvenOdd`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `EvenOdd`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.FillRule*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> and a tangent vector on this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> at the specified fraction of its length.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>和上的一个切线向量<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>在其长度的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The fraction of the length of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此长度的部分<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the location on this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> at the specified fraction of its length.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含对此位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>在其长度的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the tangent vector.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含正切向量。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>对象为空。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>空; 否则为**false**。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>对象可能具有曲线段。

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry"></xref>对象可能具有曲线段; 否则为**false**。
